title: Volkswagen ID. Models Grew 49.1% in Europe in 2025
description:
Volkswagen saw strong electric vehicle sales growth in Europe last year, especially in its home market of Germany. It is probably no coincidence that Tesla sales plummeted in Europe, especially Germany, at the same time. I’ll circle back to that, but the bad news is that Volkswagen’s EV sales were ... [continued]

The post Volkswagen ID. Models Grew 49.1% in Europe in 2025 appeared first on CleanTechnica.
